com.aj.android.commons.image

Class BitmapUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aj.android.commons.image.BitmapUtils

  • public class BitmapUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Bitmap Utils is collection of all library methods, used to save, transform Bitmap and other utilities for Drawable.
    Author:
    Akhil Jain

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BitmapUtils.BitmapDetails
      Used to store Bitmap Details, width and height and use as and when needed.

      • drawable2Bitmap

      • saveBitmapToFile

        public static void saveBitmapToFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                    Bitmap bitmap,
                                    Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                                    int quality)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Save Bitmap to file. Automatically create directory/ directories if not present.
        If writing to external location, please make sure you have android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission defined in manifest.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - String path where image has to saved.
        bitmap - - Bitmap image which has to be saved.
        format - - Bitmap.CompressFormat format of the image in which bitmap needs to be saved.
        quality - - int quality for the image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        java.io.IOException - if any IO related exception occur.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any String parameter is empty or null.

      • saveBitmapToFile

        public static void saveBitmapToFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                    byte[] bitmap)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Save Bitmap to file. Automatically create directory/ directories if not present.
        If writing to external location, please make sure you have android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission defined in manifest.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - String path where image has to saved.
        bitmap - - byte[] bitmap image which has to be saved.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        java.io.IOException - if any IO related exception occur.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any String parameter is empty or null.

      • rotate

        public static Bitmap rotate(Bitmap bitmap,
                            float angle)
        Rotates a given Bitmap image by provided angle.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - - Bitmap image which has to be rotated.
        angle - - angle by which image has to be rotated.
        quality - - int quality for the image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • drawShadow

        public static Bitmap drawShadow(Bitmap bitmap,
                                int radius)
        Rotates a given Bitmap image drop shadow by given radius.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - - Bitmap image.
        radius - - distance from image where shadow to be dropped.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • getRoundedCornerBitmap

                                            float roundPx)
        Rotates a given Bitmap image pixels have to be rounded
        Parameters:
        bitmap - - Bitmap image.
        roundPx - - pixels by which corners have to be rounded.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • getReflectBitmap

        public static Bitmap getReflectBitmap(Bitmap bitmap,
                                      float rate,
                                      boolean recycleOriginalBitmap)
        Returns the Bitmap reflected of the original Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - - Bitmap image.
        rate - - reflection rate.
        recycleOriginalBitmap - - true to recycle the original bitmap.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • getReflectBitmap

        public static Bitmap getReflectBitmap(Bitmap bitmapImage,
                                      float rate)
        Returns the Bitmap reflected of the original Bitmap image.
        Does not recycle the original Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmapImage - - Bitmap image.
        rate - - reflection rate.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        See Also:
        #getReflectBitmap(Bitmap, float, boolean)}.

      • getSquareBitmap

        public static Bitmap getSquareBitmap(Bitmap bitmapImage)
        Returns the squared Bitmap of the original Bitmap image.
        Default squaring is done by 0.1f .
        Parameters:
        bitmapImage - - Bitmap image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        See Also:
        #getSquareBitmap(Bitmap, float)}.

      • getSquareBitmap

        public static Bitmap getSquareBitmap(Bitmap bitmapImage,
                                     float rate)
        Returns the squared Bitmap of the original Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        bitmapImage - - Bitmap image.
        rate - - squaring rate.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • clipCircleBitmap

        public static Bitmap clipCircleBitmap(Bitmap bitmapImage)
        Clips / cuts the given Bitmap image to circular image.
        Recycles the old bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        bitmapImage - - Bitmap object.
        Returns:
        Bitmap clipped circular image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • getBluredBitmap

        public static Bitmap getBluredBitmap(Bitmap bitmap)
        Return Blurred Bitmap.
        Blurring is done based on default Blur radius of 12
        Parameters:
        bitmap - -Bitmap image to be blurred.
        Returns:
        Bitmap blurred image
        See Also:
        #getBluredBitmap(Bitmap, int)}.

      • getBluredBitmap

        public static Bitmap getBluredBitmap(Bitmap bitmapImage,
                                     int radius)
        Stack Blur Algorithm by Mario Klingemann
        Parameters:
        bitmapImage - - Bitmap.
        radius - - int blur radius.
        Returns:
        Bitmap blurred object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
